officialTitle: 3-D Simultaneous Ultrasound and NIR Imaging for Breast Cancer Detection
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The deoxygenated/oxygenated hemoglobin and total hemoglobin concentration are the measured imaging parameters and biopsy results will be used as the 'gold' standard to compare imaging findings.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women undergoing ultrasound guided biopsy or breast cancer patients undergoing neoadjuvant thermotherapy treatment

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women under 18 years old.
